keybinding.category.x_enchantment.name: X-Enchantment
keybinding.key.x_enchantment.name: Settings
advancements.x_enchantment.more_loot.sup: Super Loot...The loot is amplified second times.
advancements.x_enchantment.broken_dawn.d: Item completes the Broken Dawn process, and sublimation.
Oh... The head hurts so much~
enchantment.x_enchantment.auto_fish.desc: When fishing, the rod can be automatically retracted, and there is a certain chance to restore the durability.
enchantment.x_enchantment.librarian.desc: Chance to find enchanted books when fishing. The quality of enchanted books is directly proportional to luck.
enchantment.x_enchantment.suck_blood.des: Draw a certain percentage of attack damage blood volume.
enchantment.x_enchantment.weakness.desc: Chance to cause extra critical damage.
enchantment.x_enchantment.increment_atta: Initial attacks decrease, but attacks can grow.
enchantment.x_enchantment.more_loot.desc: The loot has a chance to be doubled extra, very small chance to be super doubled.
enchantment.x_enchantment.climber.desc: Gain a jump boost effect at a certain height.
enchantment.x_enchantment.diffusion.desc: Diffusion arrow after hitting the target.
enchantment.x_enchantment.shoot_speed.de: Greatly increase the speed of arrow, Note: Arrow speed is proportional to its damage
enchantment.x_enchantment.night_break.de: For every certain number of attacks, the next attack deals a percentage of the target's maximum health true damage.
enchantment.x_enchantment.broken_dawn.de: Normally, completing the evolution can upgrade the enchantment of the item, small chance to upgrade items, if there are no higher-level items, enchantment upgrade +3. It will eventually evolve when the dawn is coming, it hopes...
enchantment.x_enchantment.timor.desc: After lurking for a certain period of time, it will become invisible, and the attack speed will increase when the invisibility is released.
enchantment.x_enchantment.height_advanta: Deals damage to creatures that are taller than you every once in a while.
enchantment.x_enchantment.with_effect.de: Add a status effect to yourself
Remove cursed enchantment at the anvil
enchantment.x_enchantment.health_convert: When holding the enchanted book in the secondary hand, it will damage itself and repair the items in the main hand, with a certain trigger interval.
enchantment.x_enchantment.infinity_enhan: Can add mending to infinite bows at the anvil
Slightly strengthens attribute, use on trinkets
enchantment.x_enchantment.regicide.desc: When the attack damage is less than a certain level, the damage will also fall on you. What happens when you show weakness?
enchantment.x_enchantment.thin.desc: There is a chance that extra durability will be consumed when used.
enchantment.x_enchantment.insanity.desc: Attack range increased，However, there is a certain chance that it will automatically attack other creatures.
enchantment.x_enchantment.halo.farm_spee: Speed up crop growth, head part. A type of halo that needs to be assembled to activate all parts.
Speed up crop growth, chest part. A type of halo that needs to be assembled to activate all parts.
Speed up crop growth, legs part. A type of halo that needs to be assembled to activate all parts.
Speed up crop growth, feet part. A type of halo that needs to be assembled to activate all parts.
enchantment.x_enchantment.halo.allied_bo: Gives partner status effects, head part. A type of halo that needs to be assembled to activate all parts.
Gives partner status effects, chest part. A type of halo that needs to be assembled to activate all parts.
Gives partner status effects, legs part. A type of halo that needs to be assembled to activate all parts.
Gives partner status effects, feet part. A type of halo that needs to be assembled to activate all parts.
x_enchantment.disabled.tip: Off is enabled, on is disabled. Disabled is means exists but does not take effect.
x_enchantment.only_one_level.tip: Any effect of this enchantment has nothing to do with the level, that is, adjusting the level is invalid. This button is for illustration only and has no additional effect.
x_enchantment.need_reconnect.tip: Indicates that the enchantment requires the client to reconnect to the server to take effect. This button is for illustration only and has no additional effect.
x_enchantment.halo.interval.tip: The trigger interval of the halo, in seconds.
x_enchantment.halo.range.tip: The effective range of the halo, based on the current living entity coordinates
x_enchantment.halo.player_only.tip: Enchanted sets only trigger the halo effect while they are present on the player
x_enchantment.halo.halo.tip: This enchantment is a type of halo. This button is for illustration only and has no additional effect.
x_enchantment.menu.option.only_server.ti: Tip: Remote game modification configuration does not take effect, local games need to be modified after entering the game!!!
x_enchantment.info.night_break.damage.ti: Percentage of true damage to the target that deals maximum health.
x_enchantment.info.night_break.damage_co: The interval between attacks for each true damage attack.
x_enchantment.menu.option.night_break.da: Percentage of true damage to the target that deals maximum health. If the current value is 1.5 and the enchantment level is 3, the effect is 4.5% (= 3 * 1.5%).
The interval between attacks for each true damage attack.
x_enchantment.menu.option.soul_hit.damag: Addition base per level. If the current value is 1.5 and the enchantment level is 3, the effect is 4.5% (= 3 * 1.5%).
x_enchantment.menu.option.weakness.crit_: Critical strike bonus per level, 10 is a bonus of 100.
x_enchantment.info.broken_dawn.done.tip: Broken Dawn is complete(main hand item)
x_enchantment.info.broken_dawn.done_limi: Max value for evolutionary(main hand item)
x_enchantment.info.broken_dawn.level_up_: Chance that a tool can be upgraded to a higher-level tool after Daybreak triggers. It is usually judged that the higher durable/attack damage.(main hand item)
After the trigger of dawn, the tool is upgraded to a more advanced tool.(main hand item)
x_enchantment.menu.option.broken_dawn.le: Chance that a tool can be upgraded to a higher-level tool after Daybreak triggers. It is usually judged that the higher durable/attack damage.
x_enchantment.menu.option.broken_dawn.do: How long the tool is used can break the dawn. If the value is 1.5, the tool needs to accumulate durability loss (1.5 maximum durability) before breaking the dawn.
x_enchantment.info.more_loot.super_loot_: After triggering, harvest the probability of continuing to magnify.
x_enchantment.menu.option.more_loot.effe: Effect on ore block, like drop's from 'Silk Touch' enchantment
x_enchantment.menu.option.more_loot.supe: After triggering, harvest the probability of continuing to magnify.
x_enchantment.menu.option.shoot_speed.va: Speed Base for each level. 1 is 10%
x_enchantment.info.regicide.value.tip: Any attack damage the attacker causes that is less than or equal to this value will injure himself.
x_enchantment.menu.option.insanity.attac: Automatic attack trigger min interval, in seconds
x_enchantment.menu.option.health_convert: Harm to the user after use
x_enchantment.info.height_advantage.dama: Damage per level, if the value is 15, level 3, it does 45 damage to living entity
x_enchantment.menu.option.height_advanta: Damage per level, if the value is 15, level 3, it does 45 damage to living entity
x_enchantment.menu.option.diffusion.dama: Diffusion arrow damage per level. If the value is 15, level 3, the diffusion arrows deal 45%(3 * 15%) source arrow damage.
x_enchantment.menu.option.diffusion.coun: Number of spread arrows per level.
x_enchantment.menu.option.climber.y.tip: Less than this height does not take effect.
x_enchantment.menu.option.magic_immune.b: Certain effects are prohibited from taking effect.
x_enchantment.menu.option.walk_on.ban.ti: Does not work on some fluids.
x_enchantment.menu.option.thin.rate.tip: Chance of extra damage to trigger.
x_enchantment.menu.option.thin.value.tip: Bonus to more damage to tools per level.
x_enchantment.info.with_effect.head: Head
x_enchantment.menu.option.halo.allied_bo: Based on the percentage relationship of the interval time, when the value is 1, the effect duration = interval time.
Certain effects are prohibited from taking effect.
